column4: Hello, I'm using the S-Video out port on my nvidia FX5200 with propitary drivers. Connected to my TV. The image is black and white.
I suspect this is becouse it outputs NTCS and the TV is PAL. But I can't find anywhere where I can change this........
PAL/NTSC can be set in Xorg.conf - see http://www.linuxforums.org/forum/suse-linux-help/43764-nvidia-tv-out-config.html for an example.  Good luck.
